About.summary: I am a Sophomore at Vellore Institute of Technology, Bhopal studying Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
About.content: I am passionate about Machine Learning and Data Science, basically I am an AI enthusiast. I have also been exposed to Computer Vision. Currently I am exploring Web Development. I have also studied few research papers related to Machine Learning and Computer Vision

Resume.brief: Working as a full-time Data Scientist in Supra Oncology on various NLP and CV pipelines.

I Worked with 50 engineers worldwide for 8 weeks to develop a species Identification model for Mosquitoes Using AI for Vectech, a technology social enterprise working to empower public health organizations in the global fight against mosquito-borne disease.

I did an Ideation Project with Feynn lab and now I am Team Lead for the second project in which I and my team is performing market segmentation for clients of Feynn Labs I am also working on a prototype of the Ideation Project, in which I am building a website in which small businesses can use Association rule mining and data analysis to understand purchasing patterns of their customers, which would help them to in customer retention and grow their business. In 2nd project, I and my team did AI job segmentation in India. We first web scrapped a few job sites and did clustering based on skills requirement, company, geographical location, etc.

Resume.pos: Deep Learning with Computer Vision Training
Resume.brief:
Learned CNN Architecture and made two projects:- 
Project 1- Breast Cancer Detection
Project 2 - Global Wheat Detection
Global AI Hub is the Swiss-based leading global community for AI education and AI career opportunities.

projects.title: Predicting Survival of Patient

projects.title: Plant Disease Classification
projects.desc: Performing hyperparameter tuning and deciding best Convolutional neural network (CNN) architecture using MONK AI to classify 39 different plant leaf images using the data gathered by Plant Village.
